text: (atarku napiye!) Kuruviraka: â€˜â€˜Allah natiyatait tavira oru nanmaiyo timaiyo nan enakke tetikkolla caktiyarravan. Ovvoru vakupparukkum oru kurippitta tavanaiyuntu. Avarkalutaiya tavanai varum camayattil oru nalikai kuta pinta mattarkal; muntakkuta mattarkal.'' (Attavanaiyil avarkal kariyam mutivu perruvitum)
